title: Disable the Steel Watch
content:
the facility. We learned the sequence to force the Foundry to self-destruct. We need to get to the Neurocitor, which lies in the lower levels of the facility. Toobin died, and can no longer help us destroy the Foundry. We reached the heart of the Steel Watch Foundry - the Neurocitor. If we use Wulbren's runepowder bomb on it, it should be enough to destroy the Foundry. We no longer have Wulbren's runepowder bomb. We need to find another way to destroy the Foundry.
